00026 #define DLERROR_STR_MAX_LEN 256
00027 
00028 #ifndef SUFSHARE
00029 # error "SUFSHARE needs to be defined to allow compilation"
00030 #endif

00041 #if defined(__APPLE__) && (__GNUC__ < 4)    
00042 namespace {
00043   /*
00044    * Provide portable dl functions using Apple's API for gcc prior to v4
00045    */
00046   
00065   static const char *setError(int isSet, const char *fmt, ...) {
00066     static char errorStr[DLERROR_STR_MAX_LEN];
00067     static int errorIsSet = 0;
00068     va_list arg; 
00069     if (isSet) {
00070       //set the error string
00071       va_start(arg, fmt);
00072       vsnprintf(errorStr, sizeof(errorStr), fmt, arg);
00073       va_end(arg);
00074       errorIsSet = 1;
00075     } else {
00076       //get the error string
00077       if (errorIsSet) {
00078         errorIsSet = 0;
00079         return errorStr;
00080       } else {
00081         return 0;
00082       }
00083     }
00084     return 0;
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void * p_dlopen(const char *path, int mode) {  /* mode ignored */
00089   NSObjectFileImage *fileImage;
00090   NSModule handle = 0;
00091   NSObjectFileImageReturnCode  returnCode =
00092     NSCreateObjectFileImageFromFile(path, &fileImage);
00093   
00094   if(returnCode == NSObjectFileImageSuccess) {
00095     //try to load bundle (not used for EUROPA2)
00096     handle = NSLinkModule(fileImage, path,
00097                        NSLINKMODULE_OPTION_RETURN_ON_ERROR |
00098                        NSLINKMODULE_OPTION_PRIVATE);
00099   } else if(returnCode == NSObjectFileImageInappropriateFile) {
00100     //try to load dynamic library (normal path in EUROPA2)
00101     handle = NSAddImage(path, NSADDIMAGE_OPTION_RETURN_ON_ERROR);
00102   }
00103   if (!handle) {
00104     setError(1, "p_dlopen:  Could not load shared library: %s", path);
00105   }
00106   return handle;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void * p_dlsym(void * handle, const char * symbol) {
00110   char ubSymbol[256];
00111   snprintf (ubSymbol, sizeof(ubSymbol), "_%s", symbol);
00112   
00113   NSSymbol nssym = NSLookupSymbolInImage(handle, ubSymbol,
00114                                     NSLOOKUPSYMBOLINIMAGE_OPTION_RETURN_ON_ERROR |
00115                                     NSLOOKUPSYMBOLINIMAGE_OPTION_BIND);
00116   if (!nssym) {
00117     setError(1, "p_dlsym: Did not find symbol %s", ubSymbol);
00118   }
00119   return (NSAddressOfSymbol(nssym));
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 const char * p_dlerror(void) {
00124   return setError(0, (char *) 0);
00125 }
00126 
00127 int p_dlclose(void * handle) {
00128   
00129   DYLD_BOOL result = NSUnLinkModule(handle, 0);
00130   if (!result) {
00131     setError(1, "p_dlclose: Failed to close library %s", NSNameOfModule(handle));
00132     //darwin doesn't seem to support unloading shared libraries, so fake it.
00133     return 0;
00134   }
00135   return 0;
00136 }
00137 #elif defined(__MINGW32__)
00138 
00139 namespace {
00140   DWORD dlerror_last = ERROR_SUCCESS;
00141 }
00142   
00143 void* p_dlopen(const char* path, int mode) {
00144   if(!path) {
00145     dlerror_last = ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00146     return NULL;
00147   }
00148   HMODULE result = LoadLibrary(path);
00149   
00150   if(!result)
00151     dlerror_last = GetLastError();
00152   return result;
00153 }
00154 
00155 void* p_dlsym(void* handle, const char* symbol) {
00156   HMODULE hmodule = (HMODULE) handle;
00157   
00158   if(!handle) {
00159     dlerror_last = ERROR_INVALID_HANDLE;
00160     return NULL;
00161   }
00162   
00163   void* result = (void*) GetProcAddress(hmodule, symbol);
00164   
00165   if(!result)
00166     dlerror_last = GetLastError();
00167   
00168   return result;
00169 }
00170 
00171 const char* p_dlerror(void) {
00172   if(dlerror_last != ERROR_SUCCESS) {
00173     static char buffer[256];
00174     if(!FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS | FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM, NULL, dlerror_last, 0, buffer, sizeof(buffer), NULL))
00175       snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "Failed to format error message");
00176 
00177     dlerror_last = ERROR_SUCCESS;
00178     
00179     return buffer;
00180   }
00181   return NULL;
00182 }
00183 
00184 int p_dlclose(void* handle) {
00185   HMODULE hmodule = (HMODULE) handle;
00186   
00187   if(!hmodule)
00188     return 0;
00189   
00190   int result = FreeLibrary(hmodule);
00191   if(!result)
00192     dlerror_last = GetLastError();
00193   
00194   return !result;
00195 }
00196 #else
00197 /*
00198  * use unix dl functions in all non Apple cases
00199  */
00200 void * p_dlopen(const char *path, int mode) {  
00201   return dlopen(path, mode);
00202 }
00203 
00204 void * p_dlsym(void * handle, const char * symbol) {
00205   return dlsym(handle, symbol);
00206 }
00207 
00208 const char * p_dlerror(void) {
00209   return dlerror();
00210 }
00211 
00212 int p_dlclose(void * handle) {
00213   return dlclose(handle);
00214 }
00215 #endif
